column1: arthur-hoornweg-791b3123,Arthur,Hoornweg,"Senior Software Engineer R&D, Geologist",https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E03AQFKoDcpyxuY0A/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1670830007323?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=zCjsEN4V4yBwb9X8tsginsmSjTnEuLXY40LJpBo7KUU,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E16AQHfeYNCJU2FjA/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1670830654843?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=3vJIzOjpjm8j23vst6lHvtG8wgk-EMa6Q_L0e7kqrsc,personal,ACoAAAT48h0BExenYEsL2GJIzODpOeQNNJsT_-c,83423773,,"Software developer with over 30 years of experience building software in the field of surface data logging  on oil-, gas- and geothermal wells.  High affinity with technology and communication. Polyglot (fluent in 3 languages, happy to converse in 3 more).  Using the Delphi programming language since its invention.
My expertise involves the creation of:

column2: A software suite for the acquisition, integration, visualization and correlation of geological,  geophysical, mechanical, directional, lab- and sensor data on drilling sites in a multi-user environment.  This software is used on-site by mudloggers, wellsite geologists, mud engineers, toolpushers and MWD/LWD engineers. It is also licensed to several oil companies.
The necessary database (MS-SQL), capable of integrating numerical data with geological data such as petrography, analyses, attachments, and written reports.

High-quality graphical output of logs that combine geology with user-defined curves of numerical data (including MWD/LWD, gas chromatography, sensor data, directional data etc.), alongside borehole- and casing geometry, annotations and descriptions.
Calculating the 3D spatial trajectory of the curved wellbore and using if for pressure calculations and for outputting logs against TVD.
Calculating fluid pressures, pressure losses and kick tolerance in the borehole using drilling fluid rheology, flow rate and motion of the drill string.
Calculating overburden-, fracture- and pore pressure gradient in the surrounding formation using information obtained from leakoff tests, cuttings density analysis and Poisson ratio, trend lines etc.
Establishing trend lines for lithology compaction indicators such as DxC exponent, density log, porosity log etc.
Hydrocarbon ratio analysis (wh, bh, ch) from gas chromatography data
Data export- and import modules for common oil field digital data exchange formats.
A web site offering depth-based visualization of the aforementioned graphical logs, also showing the drill string elements inside the casing and lithology.
A Data Replication System (client/server) that mirrors all databases via the internet to the customer’s office with low latency.
A Data Replication system that continuously streams/converts the SQL data to a WitsML server.

Many other software packages.
